text: Kodjo Fo-Doh Laba (born 27 January 1992) is a Togolese international footballer who plays for Emirati club Al Ain, as a forward. ==Career== Born in Lomé, Laba has played for Anges FC, US Bitam and RS Berkane. He signed for Al Ain in June 2019. He made his international debut in 2016, and was named in the squad for the 2017 Africa Cup of Nations. ===International goals=== :Scores and results list Togo's goal tally first. {|class="wikitable
